Package View.EntitiesGraphics.EnemyGraphics

Class EnemyGraphics

java.lang.Object
View.EntitiesGraphics.EntityGraphics
View.EntitiesGraphics.EnemyGraphics.EnemyGraphics
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, Animatable, Drawable, ImgImporter
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlueEnemyGraphics, BrownEnemyGraphics, ClownBossGraphics, FinalBossGraphics, LastEnemyGraphics, RedEnemyGraphics, YellowEnemyGraphics
public abstract class EnemyGraphics extends EntityGraphics implements Observer
This class manages the graphical representation of enemies
